function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Upgrade interior finishing materials to easily cleanable surfaces, install hygiene and sanitation stations, and implement regular cleaning and maintenance schedules.","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize building envelope design to maximize natural ventilation and light, incorporate air purification systems, and promote indoor plant growth.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redesign parking area layout to increase spacing, implement digital parking systems to reduce contact, and improve ventilation and air quality in the parking area.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance insulation, improve window glazing, and implement energy-efficient hvac systems to maintain thermal comfort and reduce energy demand.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Allocate additional space for students and vehicles to reduce congestion and allow for adequate physical distancing measures.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expand parking capacity, enforce distancing guidelines for parked vehicles, and address overhanging structures to minimize close contact.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement smart design for multi-use of parking buildings","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement ventilation systems, regular cleaning and disinfection, promote use of open-air parking","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement staggered parking schedules, designate spaced-out parking areas, promote alternative transportation methods","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement proper ventilation systems and air purification technology","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide adequate sanitation facilities, promote hygiene best practices","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement security cameras, lighting, and emergency communication systems","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear and defined pedestrian routes, distinctive colors for pedestrian areas, and high-quality lighting","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement suitable monitoring systems in the parking area to prevent obstruction of circulation passages","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Design efficient circulation roadways and gates to avoid queues, and plan large parking for long-stay and/or frequent users","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating traffic calming measures, clear pedestrian pathways, and visibility enhancements in parking design","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ensuring sufficient and accessible designated parking spaces for disabled individuals in compliance with accessibility regulations","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing smart parking design, utilizing technology for optimal space utilization, and integrating multi-level or automated parking systems","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement clear signage, dedicated pedestrian pathways, and traffic calming measures at entrance and exit points","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Install adequate ventilation systems, energy-efficient lighting, and air quality monitoring to maintain a healthy environment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive review of the guidelines or standards and integrate infectious disease control measures into the design principles.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for on-site research activities, including the use of personal protective equipment ppe and adherence to infection control measures.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate infectious disease control measures such as touchless entry systems, enhanced ventilation, and antimicrobial surfaces into the adaptation proposal for car parking buildings.","category":"Touchless technologies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems, reduce occupancy levels, and implement social distancing measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate spatial planning to maintain distance, utilize barriers and partitions, and optimize building layout for distance","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing flexible and modular building design to accommodate changing requirements","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating health and hygiene guidelines into design decisions, consulting with public health experts","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting post-construction assessments to identify and address potential disease transmission risks","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adhering to public health guidelines and gradually easing restrictions based on case numbers and vaccination rates","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure equitable access to technology, address privacy concerns, and develop alternative non-technological solutions","category":"Access control / privacy / digital governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate social and economic considerations into pandemic management, prioritize community engagement and support","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facilitate dialogue and coordination between different technological approaches, prioritize interoperability and data-sharing","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and regulating the use of covtech, ensuring data privacy and security, and educating the public about potential risks","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Training for law enforcement, improved communication and de-escalation tactics","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased funding and resources, collaborative partnerships with other smart cities","category":"Absorb surge in service demand","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement privacy-focused contact-tracing technologies and transparent data protection measures","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct rigorous testing and evaluation of the technology-enabled strategies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop a unified smart city policy framework for public health crisis management","category":"Policy design / enactment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement decentralized decision-making structures and empower local administrative offices","category":"Policy design / enactment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection laws, anonymize data, and obtain consent for data collection","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to privacy regulations, ethical use of technology, and transparent communication with the public","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fact-checking initiatives, transparency in data collection, and community engagement","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish strict data privacy regulations and conduct regular security audits of the icccs.","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement regulations and governance frameworks to ensure responsible data management and usage.","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce competition regulations and promote open data initiatives to encourage innovation and diversity in urban services.","category":"Achieve resilience through diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engage with civil society organizations and local communities to understand and address their specific concerns and needs","category":"Social engagement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement data privacy regulations and protections, engage with local communities to ensure data integrity and consent","category":"Data governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement transparent data usage policies, engage with public health authorities and local communities to ensure ethical use of data","category":"Data governance / Social engagement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear and standardized definitions of modes of existence","category":"Policy design / enactment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comprehensive risk assessments of socio-technical networks and their impact on disease transmission","category":"Risk management / risk-assessment","confidence":"High"}]}
